record.id: module="requestTask" and status="Ready" and workflow="Request Task with CMDB Update"
record.recordid: requestTask - Ready - Request Task with CMDB Update
record.condition: not (same(phaseName in $L.wfPhase, "Active")) or phaseName in $L.wfPhase="Active" and status in $L.file="Ready"
record.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentWFPhase</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase Name">phaseName</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Active</Value></condition><collection logical="OR" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentWFPhase</TableName><FieldName caption="Phase Name">phaseName</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Active</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Ready</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
record.conditionDesc: ( Phase Name in CurrentWFPhase != "Active" OR ( Phase Name in CurrentWFPhase = "Active" AND Status in CurrentRecord = "Ready"))
